title: A Cleopatra Extravaganza: Travel to Ancient Egypt
description: Join Saara El-Arifi at the spectacular Fitzrovia Chapel for a launch event worthy of a queen! Listen to Saara in conversation with fellow author Nikita Gill, meet her at the book signing and enjoy exclusive activities. All attendees will receive a complimentary glass of prosecco on entry (non-alcoholic option available) and will take home a goody bag which includes a copy of Cleopatra.
